articles.title: Afghanistan crisis: How Europe soured on Joe Biden - BBC News
articles.description: In many EU circles, the honeymoon period for Donald Trump's successor may be coming to an end.
articles.content:
By Mark LowenBBC Europe correspondent
image captionFrance is the oldest ally of the US but is the alliance under strain?
From a white-knuckle grip with Trump to an arm on the shoulder with Biden, E… [+6294 chars]
